content:
ICS 8 - Introduction to Computer Security Homework 6, 50 Points
Due: Tuesday, November 16, 2010, at the beginnning of class

  1. Project P-5.8. Follow the instructions as given in the book, except that in this case each member of the team should write a separate report. Some possible systems to use include Kismac (for the Mac) and Wireshark (for Mac, Windows, and Linux). Please cite your sources and your collaborator(s). If you don't have access to a computer with a wireless network adapter, please contact Professor Goodrich. 30 points.
  2. Problem C-5.14 from Chapter 5, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  3. Problem C-5.15 from Chapter 5, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  4. Problem R-6.1 from Chapter 6, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  5. Problem R-6.3 from Chapter 6, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
Please write no more than a single paragraph for an answer to any R- or C-question. In many cases, a single sentence could be sufficient.
